Thank you for your interest in our experiment! You've been asked to participate in this experiment because you're a native speaker of Welsh. You don't have to take part in this research if you don't want to, and nothing bad will happen if you choose not to. If you start and decide you don't want to keep going, you can stop anytime and your data will not be recorded.

If you decide to participate, the work could take up to half an hour if you decide to participate in all parts. Most participants finish each part in ten minutes or less. You might:

  • Answer some questions about how old you were when you learned each language you speak, how often you speak Welsh with friends or family, or that sort of thing.
  • Read words in Welsh, and press a button on a computer to say if what you read was a real word or not, or type a response, or that sort of thing.
  • Listen to sounds or words or parts of words in Welsh, and press a button on a computer to say if what you heard was a real word or not, or what sounds you heard, or how much like a real word the thing sounded, or that sort of thing.

There are no special risks to this study.

There is no benefit directly to you from participating in this research, except that you might find it satisfying to help create a record of the language and help people understand more about it. The project has a general benefit to others, especially for helping people learn to speak Welsh. It doesn't cost you anything to participate other than your time.

If you have any worries about this research, you can contact the leader of the project, Michael Hammond, Ph.D., at +1 520 621 5759, or the University of Arizona Human Subjects Protection Program at +1 520 626 6721 or http://rgw.arizona.edu/compliance/human-subjects-protection-program.

This research is sponsored by a joint grant from the National Science Foundation and Research Council UK.

By participating in the research, you have provided your consent to have your information used for research purposes. The data we collect from your participation will be available to all participating researchers at the University of Arizona and Bangor University, but it will not be associated with your name or other identifiable information.

If you agree to continue with this experiment, click the checkbox below and press Start Experiment.

I agree to take part in this study.
